content: the minimalist cotton tee is a drop sleeve cropped t-shirt with a large neck boat i designed it based on my favorite t-shirts that i like to wear with high-rise skirts or jeans it is an easy pattern for beginners or any knitter that wants to knit a project while watching netflix or talking to friends it is knitted with **the cotton by we are knitters** but you can knit with whatever dk yarn that you have note that this pattern wasn t tested on other sizes so right now i cannot tell you exactly how much yarn you will need for the size s/m i used around 3 balls 100g and 212m each if you knit this pattern i would like to have your feedback if you post on instagram tag me **@minimalistknitting** or use the hashtag **#minimalistcottontee** on your photos have fun knitting
